text: Tomara ki dekhate pa'o ni ye allah tomadera jan'ya anugata kare diyechena ya kichu rayeche mahakasamandalite o ya kichu ache prthibite, ara tomadera prati tini purnamatraya arpana karechena tamra anugrahasamagri -- prakasya o aprakasya?
